EmailTemplate.subject: ONE LAST STEP NEEDED - COMPLETE MBO ACCESS PROFILE (1368120364.0)
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
- - - 90 Clean Clean false false false EN-US X-NONE X-NONE Hi Bala, There is one more step before I can submit your account for approval of reactivation. I need you to log in to MBO Access and complete your profile, specifically the industry expertise and disciplines fields for work you will be doing (this is needed for our Workers Comp. reporting). Your username for MBO Access will be the same as your MBO Business Center, and the very first time you login, your temporary password will be password123Click here to login to MBO Access today! <http://link.mbopartners.com/track?t=c&&&&https://access.mbopartners.com/login.jspa?mkt_tok=2xUAKZjCcVlYp1N76vK5L6vijzTSbpatqa8zCvjruKVUsyIUGIalUg%3D%3D> Please let me know when this is complete and I will submit your account for activation. Thank you,Sara ___________________________________ SARA CONDEConsultant Services Advisor MBO Partners t: 703.793.6028f: 703.793.6068e: sconde@mbopartners.com <mailto:sconde@mbopartners.com>w: www.mbopartners.com <http://www.mbopartners.com/> Weve got some serious perks youre eligible to win when you refer a friend <http://referral.mbopartners.com/referral-program?r=conde> to MBO Partners! Ask me about them. Notice: This email and any files transmitted with it are confidential. They are intended solely for the use of the individual addressed. If you have received this email in error please notify postmaster@mbopartners.com <mailto:postmaster@mbopartners.com> and permanently delete the e-mail and files. From: Bala Kalyanaraman [mailto:balak_42@yahoo.com] Sent: Thursday, May 09, 2013 11:59 AM To: Sara Conde Subject: RE: revised MSA Hi Sara, Pl let me know if have you activated my account for me to enter time and expensethanks,Bala
